entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 1 April 2023
